key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on third-party foundries and global supply chains
Intense competition from semiconductor giants impacting market share and pricing power
Regulatory and legal risks, including a $9 million securities fraud settlement
Geopolitical risks from U.S.-China trade tensions and export controls
controversies: $9 million settlement in a securities fraud class action lawsuit
Scrutiny over environmental practices despite sustainability progress
environmental_issues: Energy consumption and waste management concerns
Progress in sustainability but ongoing environmental scrutiny
social_issues: Ensuring compliance with labor, health, safety, and ethical standards across global operations
governance_issues: Corporate governance risks highlighted by the securities fraud settlement
Financial transparency concerns impacting investor confidence

sources.title: Microchip Technology Inc 2023 Sustainability Report
sources.snippet: Microchip Technology Inc 2023 Sustainability Report The report highlights Microchip's progress towards its sustainability goals in 2023, including a 19% reduction in Scope 1 and 2 emissions compared to the 2018 baseline, a 75% waste diversion rate from landfills, and a 100% increase in the percentage of renewable energy use compared to 2022.

sources.title: Court Grants Final Approval of $9 Million Microchip Settlement

sources.title: Microchip technology, from creation to supply chain shortage
